solution_line_template: Of the colored paper, Barbara removed {num_bundles_colored_paper} * {sheets_per_bundle} = <<{num_bundles_colored_paper}*{sheets_per_bundle}={sheets_colored_paper}>>{sheets_colored_paper} sheets of paper.
Of the white paper, she removed {num_bunches_white_paper} * {sheets_per_bunch} = <<{num_bunches_white_paper}*{sheets_per_bunch}={sheets_white_paper}>>{sheets_white_paper} sheets of paper.
Of the scrap paper, she removed {num_heaps_scrap_paper} * {sheets_per_heap} = <<{num_heaps_scrap_paper}*{sheets_per_heap}={sheets_scrap_paper}>>{sheets_scrap_paper} sheets of paper.

So in total, Barbara removed {sheets_colored_paper} + {sheets_white_paper} + {sheets_scrap_paper} = <<{sheets_colored_paper}+{sheets_white_paper}+{sheets_scrap_paper}={total_sheets_removed}>>{total_sheets_removed} sheets of paper.
